IPR registry soton_corenlppy
Last updated 17/05/2017

# University of Southampton software

soton_corenlppy
	University of Southampton
	BSD variant. This software should only be used for research, education or evaluation purposes. A free commercial license is available on request to {sem03}@soton.ac.uk.
	https://pythonhosted.org/soton_corenlppy/license.html

# 3rd party software pre-requisites (software required by module but installed independently)

python
	Python Software Foundation
	Python Software Foundation License
	http://www.python.org/psf/license
	Required by soton_corenlppy

nltk
	NLTK Project
	Apache License Version 2.0
	http://www.nltk.org
	Required by soton_corenlppy

yaml
	Kirill Simonov
	MIT
	https://pypi.python.org/pypi/PyYAML
	Required by NLTK

setuptools
	Python Packaging Authority
	Python Software Foundation License
	https://pypi.python.org/pypi/setuptools/15.2
	Required by soton_corenlppy

TreeTagger
	Helmut Schmid
	Custom license. Free for evaluation, research and teaching purposes. Commercial license available on request.
	http://www.cis.uni-muenchen.de/~schmid/tools/TreeTagger/Tagger-Licence
	Required by soton_corenlppy (optional)

Stanford POS Tagger
	Kristina Toutanova and other developers
	GPL v2. Commercial license available on request
	https://nlp.stanford.edu/software/tagger.shtml
	Required by soton_corenlppy (optional)
